entry.title: RT Developer DAO (🧱, 🚀): In partnership with @eth_barcelona, we are giving away 3 FREE tickets to attend ETH Barcelona, each worth $499 🤩🪅...
entry.summary: RT Developer DAO (🧱, 🚀) In partnership with @eth_barcelona, we are giving away 3 FREE tickets to attend ETH Barcelona, each worth $499 🤩🪅 Here's how to enter 👇 1. Retweet this tweet along with a short message saying why you want to go 2. Tag a friend See you in Spain! 🇪🇸 ETHBarcelona: Come meet the movers & shakers of the crypto world at Spain’s first Ethereum conference.🇪🇸 3 days of talks, music and festival vibes in the center of #Barcelona 🤩 Come see what the future looks like at this amazing event.🥳 🎟 Get your tickets today at http://ethbarcelona.com
